attributes.action: make it mandatory for all NEWLY QUALIFIED drivers to have to undergo SOME FORM of motorway tuition with a professional Driving Instructor
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have been fighting for over 16 years to make in mandatory for all Newly Qualified drivers to have to undergo some form of professional motorway tuition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
